# Campus Memory - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Status
- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Overview
Campus Memory is a self-learning college platform with Indian university aesthetic, featuring interactive dashboards, AI visualizations, and gamification. Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- shadcn/ui (components)
- Recharts (data visualization)
